sql.id: SELECT userId, loginMobile, pwd, userName, sex, sign, code, provinceId, cityId, countyId, imageUrl, contactphone, userType, memo, idCardUrl, idCardUrl2, auth, state, createTime, updateTime FROM u_user WHERE TRUE=TRUE << AND userId = #userId# >> << AND loginMobile like #loginMobile# >> << AND loginMobile = #loginMobile_equal# >> << AND userName like #userName# >> << AND sex = #sex# >> << AND provinceId = #provinceId# >> << AND cityId = #cityId# >> << AND countyId = #countyId# >> << AND imageUrl = #imageUrl# >> << AND contactphone = #contactphone# >> << AND userType = #userType# >> << AND state = #state# >> order by userId desc
